DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy prophylactic glycerin suppository accelerate elimination meconium large intestine thus reduce incidence feed intolerance low birth weight ( VLBW ) infant
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Prophylactic Glycerin Suppositories Feeding Intolerance Very Low Birth Weight Preterm Infants : Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: 1 . Preterm infant birth weight < 1250g . 2 . Inborn outborn infant 3 . Less 72 hour age . 1 . Congenital malformation . 2 . Acute abdomen need surgical intervention . 3 . Severity illness death likely first day birth . 4 . Inability get parental consent .
